```{r}
downloadthis::download_file(
  path = "brain.jpg",
  output_name = "CSS file from downloadthis",
  button_label = "Download css file",
  button_type = "danger",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  self_contained = FALSE
)
```
